show_name: Naruto SD: Rock Lee no Seishun Full-Power Ninden
other_title: NARUTO Spin-Off: Rock Lee & His Ninja Pals
ナルトSD ロック・リーの青春フルパワー忍伝
opening_theme: #1: "Give Lee Give Lee Rock Lee" by ANIMETAL USA and Kageyama Hironobu (eps 1-26)
